headline: NRG Energy Reports 2025 Customer Savings Through Responsive Economic Dispatch Program
summary: HOUSTON, February 10, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. today announced the Responsive Economic Dispatch (RED) Program delivered nearly $5 million in total savings to participating business customers in 2025.

raw.headline: NRG Energy Reports 2025 Customer Savings Through Responsive Economic Dispatch Program
raw.summary: HOUSTON, February 10, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. today announced the Responsive Economic Dispatch (RED) Program delivered nearly $5 million in total savings to participating business customers in 2025.
